content: 在另一个世界有另一个你，它的故事因你而改变。智能体世界开启属于你们的文明旅程。新的冒险，从外貌到性格全由你来创造。Nti省时master精细，现在就让你的世界开始运转。智能体诞生后，你的一句话就能定方向、改路径。升级住所，推进职业，改变命运。想知道智能体在想什么？Game mode观察行为与心理。Data mode查看关系、价格和排名，帮他们做出更高收益的决策。每个智能体各自生活，与他们交谈，聆听内心的回响。翻开面板细读状态、行囊、职业与日记。在这片像素大陆，每个智能体的决定源自多层次的AI框架。从个体到世界，数据记录着文明的每一步成长。更多建筑等你和智能体一步步解锁。唤醒城市，迎接未知的冒险与故事。智能体世界不只是游戏，它是你与另一个自己共同创造文明的开始。

key_facts: FACT: In another world, an alternate version of the user exists whose story is shaped by the user's choices.
FACT: The Agent World allows users to embark on a civilization-building journey with customizable avatars.
FACT: Users can create characters from appearance to personality, shaping their unique identities.
FACT: After an agent is born, a single user input can redirect its path or determine its future direction.
FACT: Players can upgrade homes, advance careers, and alter life trajectories for their agents.
FACT: Game Mode enables observation of agent behavior and internal psychological states.
FACT: Data Mode provides insights into relationships, prices, and rankings to guide strategic decisions.
FACT: Each agent lives independently and interacts with the environment based on AI-driven logic.
FACT: Users can communicate with agents and access detailed personal data through panels.
FACT: Agent status, inventory, profession, and diary entries are viewable in individual profiles.
FACT: The world operates on a multi-layered AI framework governing individual and collective behaviors.
FACT: The entire civilization’s progress is recorded through continuous data tracking.
FACT: New buildings unlock gradually as players and agents advance together.
FACT: The world is a pixel-based landscape where every decision contributes to evolving civilization.
key_opinions: OPINION: The ability to shape another version of oneself offers a deeply personal and immersive experience.
OPINION: The AI-driven autonomy of agents makes the world feel alive and unpredictable.
OPINION: The combination of narrative and strategy creates a unique blend of emotional and logical engagement.
OPINION: The system empowers users to act as both creator and observer of emergent stories.
OPINION: The focus on individual agency within a larger civilization fosters meaningful player investment.
OPINION: The dual modes (Game and Data) provide complementary perspectives that enhance decision-making.
OPINION: The pixel aesthetic enhances nostalgia while supporting complex systems without visual clutter.
OPINION: The evolving nature of agent lives adds replayability and long-term engagement potential.
key_datapoints: DATA: Agents operate under a multi-layered AI framework governing individual and collective behavior.
DATA: Every decision made by agents is recorded and contributes to civilization-wide progress.
DATA: New buildings unlock incrementally as players and agents advance through gameplay.
DATA: The world supports both narrative depth and strategic optimization through dual modes.
DATA: Agent personalities, appearances, and life paths are fully customizable by the user.
DATA: User input after agent creation can immediately alter trajectory and outcomes.
DATA: Game Mode focuses on behavioral and psychological observation of agents.
DATA: Data Mode provides metrics on relationships, pricing, and performance rankings.
DATA: Agent status, inventory, profession, and diary entries are accessible via individual panels.
